cast.overview: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.
cast.title: A Separation

details.biography: Sarina Farhadi (Persian: سارینا فرهادی; born 27 April 1998) is an Iranian actress. Born to filmmakers Asghar Farhadi and Parisa Bakhtavar, she is best known for her performance as Termeh in the acclaimed drama film A Separation (2011), which earned her a Silver Bear for Best Actress jointly with the female cast.
details.name: Sarina Farhadi
